input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Gund 4048378 Dakota Horse Stuffed Animal Plush

Item features:
Dakota the horse, pink gingham saddle, fuzzy tan mane and tail, gingham flower bridle accent, adorable smile
Embroidered horseshoes on the hooves add chic, realistic detail
Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection celebrates the spirit of the west
Surface-washable; ages 1+
11 inch length (28 cm)
High quality, huggable, loyal pals for years to come. 
GUND has been a premier plush company for over 100 years; award-winning, beloved plush designs; appeals to next generation
Premium materials, unparalleled softness and huggability

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Dakota the horse is a fun and adventurous companion for any child. Her pink gingham saddle and fuzzy tan mane and tail are a charming and unique addition to her overall appearance. Her adorable smile and embroidered horseshoes on her hooves add chic, realistic detail. Dakota is part of the Gund Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection, which celebrates the spirit of the west. This adorable stuffed animal plush is surface washable and measures 11 inches in length, making her the perfect size for cuddling. With her soft, huggable material, Dakota is sure to become a loyal pal for years to come.
input_text.Response B:
GUND is proud to introduce Dakota Horse, a new addition to our popular Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection. Dakota is a loyal, huggable pal with unparalleled softness and huggability. His fuzzy tan mane and tail and his pink gingham saddle and bridle accent make him a chic and adorable addition to any child's toy collection. His embroidered horseshoes on the hooves add realistic detail and his adorable smile is sure to capture your heart.
GUND has been a premier plush company for over 100 years and is proud to introduce Dakota Horse, a new addition to our popular Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection. Dakota is a loyal, huggable pal with unparalleled softness and huggability. His fuzzy tan mane and tail and his pink gingham saddle and bridle accent make him a chic and adorable addition to any child's toy collection. His embroidered horseshoes on the hooves add realistic detail and his adorable smile is sure to capture your heart.
GUND's high quality and award-winning plush designs appeal to the next generation and celebrate the spirit of the west. Surface-washable and appropriate for ages one and up, Dakota Horse is a premium plush toy that will provide years of fun and comfort.
